title: Very common place for a very high price
text: The location is really good but the hotel is so common...We took a king deluxe room with a rate of 679 per night. The Room was quite clean but very oldish and had nothing special.When you pay that price, you expect a little bit more than that. Last year we went to the Mercer wich is about the same price but much better and also in Soho.
